sentence.Network_en: Racial problems in a country can never be uncared - for.
sentence.Network_cn: 绝不能忽视一个国家的种族问题.

sentence.Network_en: Uncared - for it is the blizzard that looks like costar.
sentence.Network_cn: 被忽略的是貌似配角的暴雪.

PerfectNetExp.abs: if I were you , I wouldn't have the heart to leave the kids at home uncared for .如果我是你，我可不忍心把孩子们留在家里没人照看。
But everything is dirty , disused and uncared for ., 但是屋内肮脏废弃 , 无人打扫.

list.abs: my friend , my cruel uncaring friend ., 我的朋友 , 我的冷酷的朋友.
In the article she was misrepresented as an uncaring mother ., 这篇文章把她歪曲成一位缺少爱心的母亲.
They also perceived the doctor as somewhat cold and uncaring if sits too far away ., 如果医生坐得太远他们也感觉有些冷酷无情.
People who uncaring unkind or uncaring can be described as meaner than a junkyard dog ., 那些不友好的或者不予关注的人们会被描述为不怀好意的人.

auth_sentence.content: Much of the population of Valletta fled and many never returned, leaving historic buildings empty and uncared for.
